page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JULIAN
page.content: My name is Julian Metcalfe. My age is 11.I live at Catton Grove, Sunniside, Newcastle- upon_Tyne.In the morning I got up and got dressed for School,had a wash and went down for breakfast.Then I went to School with my friend John Tate.We played football when we got to School,then we went into School.My School is called Clover Hill and there is about 220 children go to it.When I got to School I met my friends and teachers,Mr Pearson and Mr Bell.We did maths first then after play we did language work. We had our lunch,then we had playtime.We then had science in which we observed a goldfish and recorded our findings in our books.Then it was playtime in which I played football.
